mapper.select: select * from itemsell order by no desc
select * from itemsell where howsell=#{howsell} order by no desc
select i.*,a.startprice,a.nowprice,a.finishtime,a.tendernumber,a.nowemail from itemsell i, auction a where i.no = a.itemno order by i.no desc
mapper.delete: delete from auction where no=(select no from auction where itemno=#{no})
mapper.update: update itemsell set itemname=#{itemname}, itemprice=#{itemprice}, itemstate=#{itemstate}, category=#{category}, itemdetail=#{itemdetail} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select imgname from itemimg where imgno=#{no}
select i.*,a.startprice,a.nowprice,a.finishtime,a.tendernumber,a.nowemail from itemsell i, auction a where i.no = a.itemno and a.itemno=#{no}
